arts.ttl: England vs Andorra – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: England and Andorra go head-to-head in the 2026 FIFA World Cup European qualifiers on Saturday at Villa Park. The Three Lions are aiming to extend their perfect start under Thomas Tuchel, while Andorra are seeking their first points of the campaign.
